description: Test in-text `_num`, `_qty` in combination with an "Allows value" range, bounds

setup.contents: [[Has type::Quantity]], [[Allows value::1..200]] [[Corresponds to::1 km²]] [[Corresponds to::0.38613 sq mi]] [[Corresponds to::1000 m²]]

tests.about: #1 (number, outside of number range but matches discrete value)
tests.subject: Example/P0460/2

to-contain: 10<span class="smw-highlighter" data-type="4" data-state="inline" data-title="Warning" title=""10" is not in the list (>1, ) of allowed values for the "Has ranged number" property.">
10<span class="smw-highlighter" data-type="4" data-state="inline" data-title="Warning" title=""10" is not in the list (>1, ) of allowed values for the "Has ranged number" property.">

tests.about: #5 (number, outside the bounds but matches discrete value)
tests.subject: Example/P0460/6

to-contain: 60.1<span class="smw-highlighter" data-type="4" data-state="inline" data-title="Warning" title=""60.1" is not in the list (1..10, 50...60, 70) of allowed values for the "Has bounded number" property.">

60.1<span class="smw-highlighter" data-type="4" data-state="inline" data-title="Warning" title=""60.1" is not in the list (1..10, 50...60, 70) of allowed values for the "Has bounded number" property.">

tests.about: #8 (1.31-) (quantity, invalid, outside of specified range, bounds)
tests.subject: Example/P0460/9

to-contain: 200.1km²<span class="smw-highlighter" data-type="4" data-state="inline" data-title="Warning" title=""200.1 km²" is not within that range of "1..200" specified by the allows value constraint for the "Has bounded quantity" property.">

tests.about: #8 (1.31+) (quantity, invalid, outside of specified range, bounds)
tests.subject: Example/P0460/9

to-contain: 200.1km²<span class="smw-highlighter" data-type="4" data-state="inline" data-title="Warning" title=""200.1 km²" is not within that range of "1..200" specified by the allows value constraint for the "Has bounded quantity" property.">
